resources.string: Scrolls to the top by tapping the status bar.
Smaller values mean faster, more powerful momentum.
Settings are saved immediately upon change.
TapToTop requires accessibility permission to detect status bar taps and perform scrolls.

Steps:
1. Tap the button above.
2. Find "TapToTop" in the list (often under "Installed apps").
3. Toggle the switch to ON.
Note: To ensure the service runs reliably on Android 16/Samsung, please set Battery usage to \"Unrestricted\".
